content.text:
[@Andre Staltz](@QlCTpvY7p9ty2yOFrv1WU1AE88aoQc4Y7wYal7PFc+w=.ed25519) 

I'll try that! I booted up WireShark but I'm having trouble getting it started. I think I'm listening on a virtual interface, this will take a bit of doing but I'll get back to you on it.

---

[@az](@24Qj8pST0woTLo0zDqFDHZqIVPENnwiBeZ+3D3Sx0l8=.ed25519) 

I'm actually in need of some post-apocalyptic PDFs. Any you can recommend?

---

[@Tim Schumacher](@o3eDT3n9urv1cyIWDuF+wQHBFj3I8OcE3L4Tla9RR8A=.ed25519)

Yeah! I saw it recommended [here](%14m7wOn747qGqLhm/2pVmMPMC3YFv3am/8sKPHKu8+A=.sha256) and gave it a download, but haven't had a chance to really dive in. I'll let you know how it works for me.
